item.title: Streamlet: Textbook Streamlined Blockchain Protocols
item.description: ((…. stream went offline in the other room, had to catch up.)) Show you new consensus protocol called streamlet. We think it is remarkably simple intuitive. This is quite a bold claim, hopefully the protocol will speak for itself Incredibly subtle, hard to implement in practice. We want to take this reputation and sweep it out the door. Jump right in. First model the consensus problem. Motivating simplicity as a goal.
